X-TIKA:content:
INVESTMENT PLAN.

BARRISTER MICHEL HOUSSOU,
04 BP 134 COTONOU BENIN RP
TEL:+229-95453467
Email:michel.houssou@caramail.com

Dear Friend,

I am Michel Houssou,Attorney to Mr.Adnan Mohammad a Lebanese Investor/Gold
merchant who died in the plane crash of Union Transport Africaines Flight
Boeing 727 in Cotonou, Benin Republic on December 25, 2003
You will read more stories about the crash on visiting this website.
www.cnn.com/2003/WORLD/africa/12/26/benin.crash/

Before his untimely death on the 25Th December 2003, Mr.Adnan Mohammad has a
huge amount of money deposit in a Security Company in Republic of Ghana,
Mr.Mohammad has in mind to use the money to invest in a gold business in Ghana
before his sudden death.

Last week his wife Mrs.Nadia Mohammad and his younger brother Ali instructed me
to look for a reliable foreign partner who will assist us to invest the money
in his country,

I contacted you to assist us in moving the fund from the Security Company in
Ghana to his country for proper investment.and we would like you to invest the
money any profitable venture you may suggest.

I seek your consent to present you as our foreign partner so that the proceeds
of the amount valued at US$18.5 Million will be arrange and transfer to your
account for investment purpose.

I guarantee that this transaction will be executed under a legitimate
arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law

All I require from you is your co-operation, honesty, trust and confidentiality
to enable us see this transaction through.we agreed to compensate you on a
mutually agreed percentage.

Once you agreed to my proposal and ready to assist us to invest this money
wisely in your country, I will send to you the Certificate of Deposit which was
issued to Mr.Adnan Mohammad when the fund was deposited in June 2003.

As soon as we hear from you I will travel to Ghana to meet the Directors of the
Security Company to discussed on how the fund will be transfer to your place.
Please call me immediately you receive this mail on my direct
line:00229-95453467

You can as well contact me on my private email-
address:michel.houssou@caramail.com
Awaiting your urgent response

My best regards

Michel Houssou
